short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An GPT based AI summarisation tool with pre-engineered prompts designed for scientific papers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An AI summarisation tool designed for journal articles and also general web pages. 

Currently, the only the text you highlight will be summarised. There are different summary modes to choose from based on your purpose. Additionally, you can ask questions specific to the selected text.

Our goal as researchers is to read and understand as quickly and thoroughly as possible. This tool aims to help you achieve that. More features are coming, so stay tuned.

Please note that the extension takes the entire article on the webpage into account, not just what you selected, in order to provide a more contextual summary. 

The icon of this extension is used under the Creative Commons (Attribution 3.0 Unported) license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/). No changes has been made to the original design. The creators, Eucalyp Studio, does not endorse this software.
